Method Detail

getSleepTime

public int getSleepTime()
Threads call this to get the standard sleep time. This way the system operates roughly at the same speed across threads.

Returns:
how long to sleep

checkForStartPause

public void checkForStartPause()
Threads should call this in every iteration of their cycle so that the system is pausable.

toggleRunningThreads

public void toggleRunningThreads()

resumeRunningThreads

public void resumeRunningThreads()

haveThreadRunOnceThenPause

public void haveThreadRunOnceThenPause()
Called from the GUI. This sets all the values in the map to true, signifying that all these threads should run once cycle and pause.

checkForNextStep

public boolean checkForNextStep(boolean justRanOneStep,
                                long threadID)
Threads call this functions with their ID. If justRanOneStep = false then return the current value for their entry in the map. Else if did just run once and the MAP says to run once and wait then return true and update map to false. If did just run once and MAP says not to

Parameters:
justRanOneStep -
threadID -
Returns:
